Office_Depot_3M_Scotchgard_Glass_Cleaner
Introducing 3M™ Glass Cleaner and Protector — the first glass cleaner with Scotchgard™ Protection.
With repeated use,1 this cleaning breakthrough from 3M builds up an invisible layer of protection that makes your biggest cleaning challenges disappear.
Lipstick, fingerprints, lotion — even permanent marker — clean up quickly Up to 2–3X better at cleaning and removing fingerprints,2 Works like a heavy-duty glass cleaner, without the high levels of solvent or ammonia Reduces fogging and dries faster than other glass cleaners Also cleans and protects other silica-based surfaces such as uncoated granite, ceramic and porcelain
1. Typically 5–7 cleanings creates a layer of Scotchgard™ Protection. 2. When compared to similar glass cleaning products, based on gloss measurements in 3M laboratories.
